headline: AES stock surges after report of potential sale amid takeover interest
summary: Investing.com -- AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) stock surged 15% following a Bloomberg report that the renewable power provider is exploring strategic options, including a potential sale, amid takeover interest from large investment firms.

headline: Solar Stocks Dive After Trump Orders End To Green Energy Subsidies
summary: Solar, renewable energy stocks tumble after President Trump issues executive order to end green energy subsidies.

headline: New Trump Order Adds to Pressure on Sunrun and Other Renewable-Energy Stocks
summary: Renewable-energy stocks fell, after President Trump issued an executive order calling for tight application of the eligibility rules for clean-energy tax credits.  Shares in solar-equipment maker First Solar fell about 5% in morning trading Tuesday, while Sunrun dropped 11%.  The tax-and-spending bill passed by Republicans last week made good on Trump's promise to withdraw President Joe Biden’s green tax credits.
